name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Mini Repair Patches
description: Tough enough to save the day, small enough to keep on hand. Make long-lasting repairs to a tent or flysheet, stop feathers from escaping from your down jacket or prevent a little hole in your pack from getting any bigger.Permanent, heavy-duty repairs to cover rips, tears and holes.Withstands washing.Rounded corners prevent lifting.Includes 6, 3.8 x 5.7cm patches.
